column3: New Description
Peerless swordsmen who have;studied the magical arts to gain an;advantage over foes.
Masters of the dark arts as;well as swordsmanship. They are able;to use the Astra combat skill.
Soldiers who imbue their lance;with the cleansing magic of the;goddess.
Holy warriors wielding spears.;They utilize magic and can;Impale their enemies.
Elusive rogues who can heal;allies and open chests.
Rogues who control magic;to both assist allies and destroy foes.;They employ Lethality.
Mages trained in swordplay in order;to heighten their abilities. They;are blessed with radiant power.
Mages who are adept with swords.;They use advanced blade techniques;and Flare to decimate foes.
Mounted magic wielders who use the;power of lightning to their;advantage.
Skilled cavalry that can use;thunder magic as well as lances.
Masters of horseback who can;control wind and thunder magic.;They heal themselves with Sol.
Skilled cavalry who blaze through;enemy lines with fire magic and;axes.
Masters of flame on horseback.;Along with fire and wind magic they;equip axes and heal with Sol.
Wyvern riders who have dabbled in;shadow rituals. Their power;comes from a dark realm.
Terrors of the sky who employ dark;powers to overcome anyone in their;way.
Dark scourges of the sky.;Those who withstand their dark;attacks are cut down by axes.
Champions of light who bring;the goddess' salvation... by;force if necessary.
Holy men who travel far and wide;to deliver the goddess' love;via axe and Corona skill.
Soren after learning of his true;birthright. Few can oppose;him casting spells from the sky.
